data.text: Saa da no, wɔbɛto saa dwom yi wɔ Yuda asase so:
Mummuebue apon no
Wobɛkora no so asomdwoe mu
Fa wo ho to Awurade so afebɔɔ,
Ɔbrɛ wɔn a wɔtete soro ase,
Anammɔn tiatia so,
Ɔtreneeni kwan so yɛ tamaa;
Yiw, Awurade, yɛnam wo mmara kwan so yi,
Me kra pere hwehwɛ wo anadwo;
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ wuyi adom adi kyerɛ amumɔyɛfo de,
Ao Awurade, wɔama wo nsa so kɔ soro,
Awurade, woama yɛn asomdwoe;
Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn, awuranom afoforo bi adi yɛn so,
Afei wɔawuwu, na wɔnte ase bio;
Woama ɔman no ayɛ kɛse, Awurade;
Awurade, wofi ahohia mu baa wo nkyɛn;
Sɛnea ɔpemfo a awo aka no
Yenyinsɛnee, yɛkyemee wɔ ɔyaw mu
Nanso wʼawufo benya nkwa;
Monkɔ, me nkurɔfo, monhyɛnhyɛn mo adan mu
Hwɛ, Awurade refi nʼatenae
